channel.title: Austria on Bird’s Eye View

item.title: Vienna, Austria
item.description: Vienna, Austria Travel date October 2021 Check other cities in Austria WARNING: There are no kangaroos in Austria Welcome to AUSTRIA, not Australia. Don’t expect to see any kangaroos crossing the street. You are about to explore the birthplace of classical music and the home to incredible artistic culture. Welcome to Wien! (Which is German for Vienna) Transportation Vienna is conveniently connected by several lines of trams, metros, and buses.
